GIMLi Geophysical Inversion and Modelling Library

GIMLi is an open-source multi-method library for solving inverse and forward tasks related to geophysical problems. Written in C++ and Python, it offers both efficiency and flexibility allowing you to quickly build your own robust inversion applications for the geophysical problem at hand.
